ing: 2 Red Delicious apples - peeled, cored and diced
des: "Perfect for pancakes, ice cream, pound cake or waffles!"
ins: Place the apples, figs, and cinnamon stick into a large saucepan. Pour in the lemon juice and apple cider. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, and cook 20 to 25 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cover the compote as it cooks if you prefer the compote thinner. Serve warm or cold.
